title: Metaverse-Based Science Project: Practical Applications Using Immersive Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Conducting science domain practical problem-solving projects using metaverse platforms (virtual/augmented reality) for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners independently design and execute science experiment simulations twice or more using immersive tools provided in a metaverse environment.
Learners collaboratively produce augmented reality (AR)-based project outcomes in teams to enhance scientific data visualization skills.
Learners analyze virtual experiment data collected within a metaverse platform and write reports linked to real-world cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
